entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wet snow mixed with rain beginning this evening and ending near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and overnight. Rain mixed with wet snow beginning before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Rain mixed with wet snow early in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
